properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 10 at 9:19PM EST until February 12 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Peachtree City GA
properties.description:
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Georgia...

Conasauga River near Tilton affecting Gordon...Murray and
Whitfield Counties

Chattooga River near Summerville affecting Chattooga County

Oostanaula River near Resaca affecting Floyd and Gordon Counties

Oostanaula River near Rome US Hwy. 27 affecting Floyd County


...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Georgia...
West Chickamauga Creek near Fort Oglethorpe affecting Catoosa and
Hamilton Counties

Lookout Creek near New England affecting Dade and Hamilton
Counties

Oostanaula River near Calhoun affecting Gordon County

Armuchee Creek near Armuchee affecting Floyd County

Coosa River near Rome Mayos Bar L & D Park affecting Floyd County

Coosa River near Plant Hammond affecting Floyd County

The Flood Warning continues for
The West Chickamauga Creek near Fort Oglethorpe.
* From Wednesday morning until Wednesday evening.
* At 8 PM Monday the stage was 8.5 feet, and rising.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Flood stage is 11 feet.
* Forecast to rise above flood stage by Wednesday morning and
continue to rise to near 11 feet by Wednesday morning.The river
will fall below flood stage by Wednesday early afternoon.
* At 9 feet, bankfull conditions are reached along the creek upstream
and downstream from the gage on the Georgia Highway 146 or Cloud
Springs Road bridge.
